articles.author: Harry Fletcher
articles.title: Part of the sun is broken and scientists are baffled - indy100
articles.description: We don’t want to alarm anyone, but the sun is broken. A section of the sun has left the surface and begun circulating around the top of the star as if it were a huge polar vortex, and it’s not exactly clear why it’s happened.The observation was made possible …
articles.content:
We dont want to alarm anyone, but the sun is broken. 
A section of the sun has left the surface and begun circulating around the top of the star as if it were a huge polar vortex, and its not exactl… [+2014 chars]

articles.title: Ancient-human fossils sent to space: researchers slam 'publicity stunt' - Nature.com
articles.description: The decision to send hominin bones on a commercial spaceflight has raised eyebrows among palaeontologists.
